sentence.Network_en: Sometimes one came near to my window, attracted by my light, barked a vulpine curse at me, and then retreated.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候，一只狐狸被我的灯光吸引住，走近了我的窗于，吠叫似地向我发出一声狐狸的诅咒，然后急速退走。
